doc.field: John H. and Catharine R. Ryerson deed to Absalom L. Anderson
John H. and Catharine R. Ryerson deed to Absalom L. Anderson

Indenture transferring a parcel of land in Manhattan from John H. Ryerson and his wife, Catharine R. Ryerson, to Absalom L. Anderson. For further details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
